title: How to Fix ARTEMIS FOWL! Worst Disney Movie?
author: Think Story
comment:
"I haven't read the books." 
Yeah, don't worry, neither have the writers of the film.
Just FYI, the villain of the first book was Artemis Fowl Jr himself. Having the villain be the protagonist is what was so interesting about it.

Book Artemis was a young criminal mastermind who was basically a magical mob boss. In other words, he was such an asshole and it made him a fun character. But Disney has no balls so he had to be a hero.

Honestly, there's no use in you rewriting it, because the story sucks and they should've just stuck to the plot in the book. If not, there's no point in calling it Artemis Fowl. What you're describing is still just a generic fantasy movie for kids.
description:
In this video we take a look at Disney's latest bad movie ARTEMIS FOWL and how to fix some of the major problems found in its plot. Is it as bad as everyone says it is? The worst? The film is based off the books by Eoin Colfer and is directed by Kenneth Branagh starring Ferdia Shaw, Josh Gad, and Judi Dench.

The Problems
